document_data.name: ''Helm of Underwater Action''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Helms of underwater action''''' were [[enchanted]] [[helmet]]s that allowed the wearer to survive underwater.
document_data.Description: These helms appeared mundane at first glance and only through means of [[Detect magic|magical detection]] could one determine their enchanted nature. Two small [[lenses]] were hidden on both sides in the helm's compartments.

Powers.Creation: A capable [[cleric]] trained in crafting of wondrous items could create a ''helm of underwater action'' with the use of a ''[[water breathing]]'' spell.

document_data.Reputation: ''Helms of underwater action'' were popular implements among those creatures unable to normally utter words and cast spells underwater.
document_data.Notable Helms of Underwater Action:
[[File:Helm of Water Breathing.jpg|thumb|''A helm of water breathing.'']]
*''[[Tasmia's Heart]]'', an enchanted helmet that functioned as a ''helm of underwater action'' as well as prolonged its wearer's life.
